Class EnquiryMenuController

java.lang.Object
EnquiryMenuController
public class EnquiryMenuController extends Object
Controls the interaction between Student, Enquiry and Camp classes.

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(Camp camp)
      Allows an enquiry to be created for a given camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp which the enquiry is being made to.

    • viewEnquiries

      public void viewEnquiries(Camp camp)
      Allows a student to view all their enquiries made for a given camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The specified camp which the student has made enquiries (if any) to.

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(Camp camp)
